Package app.utils

Class CommandManager

java.lang.Object
app.utils.CommandManager
public class CommandManager extends Object
Class that manages all commands for the collection

      public String execute(String[] s) throws ScriptErrorException
      Method for executing a command
      Parameters:
      s - String Command and arguments
      Returns:
      String The result
      Throws:
      ScriptErrorException - Thrown when the mistake in the script is encountered

    • getCommand

      public Command getCommand(String[] s) throws NoCommandException, WrongCommandException
      Method for matching an input line with the corresponding command
      Parameters:
      s - String[] Input line, split by whitespace characters
      Returns:
      Command The corresponding commands
      Throws:
      NoCommandException - When the input is empty
      WrongCommandException - When the input is not empty and doesn't correspond to any command

    • run

      public void run()
      Method for running the process of command executing

    • addScript

      public void addScript(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Method for adding a script to the script history and setting the mode of the command manager for its execution
      Parameters:
      file - File The script file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the process of reading the script encounters an unexpected input error

    • removeScript

      public void removeScript(Scanner prevScanner)
      Method for removing the script from the script history and adjusting the mode of the command manager for further work
      Parameters:
      prevScanner - Scanner Scanner that was used before the execution of the script

    • peek

      public String peek()
      Method for getting the last (most recent) element of the script history
      Returns:
      String The canonical path of the last script in the script history

    • clearScriptHistory

      public String clearScriptHistory()
      Method for clearing the script history
      Returns:
      String The first (the oldest) element of the script history
